PersonalStatement.text: Sarah Brown, born on 1989-03-11, is a Female based in Jordanchester, Malawi. She is Married and holds Moroccan nationality. Currently working at Snyder, Vaughn and Lawrence.

WorkExperience.text: Software Developer at Berry Inc from 2014 to 2019.
Senior Systems Administrator at Snyder, Vaughn and Lawrence, 2018 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Master's in Financial Economics from University of Greenwich
Master's in Engineering from Canterbury Christ Church University

PersonalSkills.text: Technical Proficiency: Expert in cloud computing and distributed systems.
Innovation: Recognized for introducing novel solutions in data science projects.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, she enjoys hiking.
